roleset.name: having ownership, perhaps stingily

example.name: arg0
example.text: He is very possesive and controlling but he has no right to be as we are not together .

example.name: The very dickens.
example.text: Laurie was possessive of her room as only an eleven-year-old girl can be, and she gave Brian the very dickens for coming in without knocking
example.arg: as only an eleven-year-old girl can be

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, possess.01, possession-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls own-100.

roleset.name: expressing the genitive. linguistics and grammar

example.name: standard
example.text: In this verse the word Vishnur is in the partitive case whereas in others the case ending is possessive.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.
